EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Strata+Hadoop World NY_Q316.Post-event
EmailTemplate.subject: Put Data to Work for Your Enterprise
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for visiting with Pivotal at Strata + Hadoop World NYC 2016! It was an ideal platform to share our data science and machine learning success stories with you.
With the show behind us, now is the time for you to take hold of your digital transformation. Regardless if you’re in pharmaceuticals, banking or telecommunications, your enterprise has the opportunity to leverage software, data and analytics to redefine its relationship with customers. You will be able to develop new business models and drive new levels of profitability and efficiency.
To learn more about how Pivotal is helping companies like yours with digital transformation, please join us for the upcoming webinar, Molina Healthcare Drives Operational IT Efficiency with Hadoop Native SQL Analytics. Molina Healthcare’s Vice President of Enterprise Infrastructure Services, Ben Gordon, will explain how Molina Healthcare uses Pivotal HDB, the leading Hadoop native SQL database, and the Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) to analyze machine-generated data from servers, databases, and applications to ensure its data centers are running at peak efficiency.
Register for the webinar, on Monday, October 24 at 11:30 am PT / 2:30pm ET, here <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/drive-operational-it-efficiency-with-hadoop-native-sql-analytics]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
